con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="MockService" targetNamespace="http://www.singhpora.com/ItemsService" xmlns:ds="http://www.singhpora.com/ItemsService" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.singhpora.com/ItemsService"> <xsd:element name="findItems"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ItemType" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="findItemsResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Items" type="ds:ItemsListType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="ItemsListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Doctor" type="ds:DoctorType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DoctorType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FullName"/> <xsd:element name="Address"/> <xsd:element name="Specialism"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="findItemsRequest"> <wsdl:part element="ds:findItems" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="findItemsResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ds:findItemsResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="ItemsService"> <wsdl:operation name="findItems"> <wsdl:input message="ds:findItemsRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="ds:findItemsResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="ItemsServiceSOAP" type="ds:ItemsService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="findItems"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.singhpora.com/ItemsService/findItems"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ItemsService"> <wsdl:port binding="ds:ItemsServiceSOAP" name="ItemsServiceSOAP"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:0000/"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
